text: Jazz Aviation LP, formerly Jazz, is a Canadian regional airline. It was founded in 2001. It is Canada's second largest airline (in terms of fleet size). The airline is headquartered at Halifax Stanfield International Airport in Enfield and Halifax, Nova Scotia. Jazz serves both Canada and the United States across 74 destinations. ==Gallery== File:Jazz Office CYHZ.JPG |The headquarters for Jazz in Enfield, Nova Scotia File:C-GKEZ landing in Vancouver.jpg | Jazz in air Canada Jazz livery CRJ-200 landing in Vancouver File:C-GOND landing in Vancouver.jpg | Jazz in Air Canada Jazz livery Dash 8-100 landing in Vancouver ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2001 establishments in Canada Category:Airlines of Canada Category:Halifax, Nova Scotia Category:Organizations based in Nova Scotia
title: Jazz Aviation
